ValidationRule.description: If Booked With is equal to InterCall, forces Operator Assisted Direct or Operator Assisted Premium as the only available options for RT Audio Service Level.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $RecordType.Name <> "L3 Dry Run", $RecordType.Name <> "L3 Premium Event", $RecordType.Name <> "L3 Standard Event", $RecordType.Name <> "RT Event", $RecordType.Name <> "Dry Run", $RecordType.Name <> "300 Port", $RecordType.Name <> "Webcasting", $RecordType.Name <> "SSBA", ISPICKVAL( Booked_With__c , "Level 3"), ISPICKVAL( RT_Event_Type__c , "300 Port"))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Level 3 events can only be marked as Auto, Operator Assisted Direct or Operator Assisted Premium. Please update the RT Audio Service Level to reflect one of these values.
